words.source: H2388 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of חָזַק 'to be strong, firm'; KJV 'was hardened', ESV 'was hardened', NASB 'was hardened'
H3820 n.ms constr. לֵב 'heart'; KJV 'heart', ESV 'heart', NASB 'heart'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H3808 conj. + neg. particle לֹא 'not'; KJV 'that he', ESV 'and he did not', NASB 'and he did not'
H8085 Qal perf. 3ms of שָׁמַע 'to hear, listen'; KJV 'hearkened … not', ESV 'listen', NASB 'listen'
H413 prep. + 3mp suff. 'to them'; KJV 'unto them', ESV 'to them', NASB 'to them'
H834 prep. k- + rel. pron. אֲשֶׁר 'as, just as'; KJV 'as', ESV 'as', NASB 'just as'
H1696 Piel perf. 3ms of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'had said', ESV 'had said', NASB 'had said'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
